mapper.insert:
select notice_seq.nextval from dual
insert into notice (nt_cd,title,e_img,content,wdate,hits) values (#{nt_cd},#{e_img},#{content},#{hits},sysdate,0)
mapper.select: select * from notice where nt_cd< #{nt_cd} and rownum=1 order by nt_cd desc
select * from notice where nt_cd> #{nt_cd} and rownum=1 order by nt_cd asc
mapper.update: update notice set hits= hits+ 1 where nt_cd= #{nt_cd}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS TOTAL FROM NOTICE WHERE TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' CONTNENT LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' CONT ENT LIKE '%'||#{searchType}||'%' OR TITLE LIKE '%'||#{searchName}||'%' 1=1
